properties.name: azure.activedirectory.resource-server.claim-to-authority-prefix-map
properties.description:
Configure which claim will be used to build GrantedAuthority, and prefix of the GrantedAuthority's string value. Default value is: "scp" -> "SCOPE_", "roles" -> "APPROLE_". Example: If use the default value, and the access_token's "scp" scope value is "testValue", then GrantedAuthority with "SCOPE_testValue" will be created..
@see org.springframework.security.core.GrantedAuthority.

deprecation.reason: Use uniform property format(spring.cloud.azure.*) in all Spring Cloud for Azure libraries.

properties.name: azure.activedirectory.resource-server.principal-claim-name
properties.description:
Configure which claim in access token be returned in AuthenticatedPrincipal#getName. Default value is "sub". Example: If use the default value, and the access_token's "sub" scope value is "testValue", then AuthenticatedPrincipal#getName will return "testValue".
@see org.springframework.security.core.AuthenticatedPrincipal#getName.

deprecation.reason: Use uniform property format(spring.cloud.azure.*) in all Spring Cloud for Azure libraries.
